using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int col;
    for(scanf("%d", &col); col != 0; scanf("%d", &col))
    {
        char str[300];
        string ans = "";
        scanf("%s", str);
        int i = 0, len = strlen(str), jump, minus = 0, plus = -1, sz = len/col;
        for(int j = 0; ; j++)
        {
            ans += str[j];
            i++;
            if(i == len)
                break;
            jump = 2*col;
            minus++;
            plus++;
            for(; jump - minus < len; jump += 2*col)
            {
                ans += str[jump - minus];
                i++;
                if(i == len)
                    break;
                if(jump + plus >= len)
                    break;
                ans += str[jump + plus];
                i++;
                if(i == len)
                    break;
            }
            if(i == len)
                break;
        }
        cout << ans << "\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
